```{r init, include=F}

library(ezids)
```

```{r init, include=F}
project = data.frame(read.csv("heart_2020_cleaned.csv"))
```

```{r q03subset}
smoke <- subset(project,Smoking==1)
smoke
smoke0 <- subset(project,Smoking==0)
smoke0
drink<- subset(project,AlcoholDrinking==1)
drink
drink0 <- subset(project,AlcoholDrinking==0)
drink0
```

```{r init, include=F}
project$HeartDisease <- as.factor(project$HeartDisease)
project$Smoking <- as.factor(project$Smoking)
project$AlcoholDrinking <- as.factor(project$AlcoholDrinking)

```

```{r ctable}
contable1 = table(project$HeartDisease, project$AlcoholDrinking)
contable1 # the contingency table
contable2 = table(project$HeartDisease, project$Smoking)
contable2 # the contingency table
loadPkg("printr")

```

```{r chisq}
chitest1 = chisq.test(contable1)
chitest1
chitest2 = chisq.test(contable2)
chitest2
```
